text: Ezɨ atrivim kamaghɨn Seruian otarimning Abisai ko Joap, aning mɨgɨa ghaze, “Kar guan bizim puvatɨ. Anetakigh. Ikiavɨra Itir God ti a mɨkemegha ghaze, ‘Nɨ akar kurabav kɨm Devitɨn atar,’ eghtɨ a bizir kam bagh nan ataram, a dera. Eghtɨ tinara kamaghɨn an azaragham, ‘Nɨ tizim bagha Devitɨn atari?’ ”
